bill.title: Merging of the state department of health and the department of human services; to provide a statement of legislative intent; to provide for a legislative management report; to provide a penalty; to provide a continuing appropriation; to provide for application; and to provide an effective date.

history.action: Introduced, first reading, referred Human Services Committee
Reported back amended, do pass, amendment placed on calendar 11 3 0
Introduced, first reading, referred Human Services Committee
Reported back amended, do pass, amendment placed on calendar 4 2 0
